website_summaries.verdict: These soft, versatile, and masterfully crafted water barbells are sure to serve you well consistently.
pros: Available in light, medium, and heavy varieties
Constructed from non-abrasive, closed-cell EVA foam that is both durable and lightweight
Take on less water than comparable options
cons: Barbell end caps sometimes come off on their own

customer_reviews.title: End Cap falls off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the medium and the heavy size water dumbbells. They worked great first couple aquasize classes and were just the right amount of resistance for my husband and I but now the caps on the ends keep coming off so the foam circles fall off. Yesterday this happened to the medium weight and we were unable to locate the side disc cap in the pool so now I'm unable to use the dumbell. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Orth

customer_reviews.title: Extremely heavy underwater and broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I only used these twice and the plastic tube inside the rings on one of them broke. The outer buoy popped off. No way to use that now. Also, these are extremely heavy under water. I was looking for 80-90% resistance. These aren't rated that way, but they must be over 100%. I do water aerobics daily with buoys. The fact that one broke after the second use tells me I need to search elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Lsm

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BEGINNERS BUT PERFECT FOR ADVANCED WATER EXERCISE FOLKS
customer_reviews.text: For the past 9 months I have been doing water aerobics at my community pool. The medium size dumbbells that are provided worked well but became too easy. It took about a month of 3 x a week to get used to these monsters but the results are awesome. I decided to not use them during the class but stay afterwards for about 30 minutes and go through my routine. The only negative issue is they do hurt my hands if I don't take a few minutes between each exercise. But who would complain spending a few extra minutes in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: C.I.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great weights
customer_reviews.text: Use one and two for different exercises in deep water. We use it for free style, under knees for thighs, for abs and the uses are many and endless. I bought this set for myself to use in my own pool. I love these.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gillman

customer_reviews.title: I use them nearly every day in my own pool & it provides a great strength conditioning for my arms
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large because I can remove the rings & adjust it to the tension that I want. I use them nearly every day in my own pool & it provides a great strength conditioning for my arms. The only thing I don't like is the end caps will sometimes pop off.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R.

customer_reviews.title: Best Aqua Exercise dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I totally LOVE these dumbbells. I have a whole routine of aqua exercises that I do with them, including arm strength and abdominal toning.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great workout
customer_reviews.text: For those who want to build up your arms, and legs for that matter, these are the dumbbells for you. Not sure what the wight actually is with the water resistance, but you will get the burn. I use them for water aerobics
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Flawed construction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a number of pairs of these and keep sending them back. The end caps that keep the cylinders on the pole keep falling off when you are using them in the water. These are “advanced” water dumbbells. Challenging. They work very well - until the end cap falls off.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great upper body workout
customer_reviews.text: With all the gyms closed I bought these to work out in the pool. I am a big guy 240pds strong but not buff. These give you a great power workout. I don't think they would work well for a small guy. You would have a hard time keeping them down in the water without floating away. I decided to even order the next size down.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works just as I need for it to. One end cap keeps coming off as some people have mentioned in reviews. Nothing a little gorilla can't fix. The cap floats so it isn't hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and a good workout!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let these be your first set of water dumbbells! I worked up to them with a smaller set and still struggle with these (I'm female, 70 yrs old). Well constructed, nice water workout equipment!
customer_reviews.author: B J

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than their weight in gold!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I've been using them about 5 times weekly since 2015. Once you learn to use them, they give excellent results. The end caps occasionally come off. Just use some super glue. You'll develop muscle much faster than swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Next level of water fitness
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! The standard size water dumbbells no longer provide enough resistance for me but these certainly do. I have been using for a couple of weeks and still cannot perform half the exercises I can with the smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: SullyTown

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Heavier (more resistant) Than Most
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 6/2020. Have used for 2 months a few times a week, but hard use. They are much heavier (more resistant) than the ones used at water classes. LOVE THEM. They did not come apart like every other I have had. And I am rough on them. There were a few scratches, small dents in the dumbells when received but did not effect performance one bit. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: faulty dumbell
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this as a gift for my grandson> I had the chance to see and use the same product. I love them. I ordered them and had them sent. recently I visited my son and found that one was faulty and the foam would not stay on the handle. big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia R. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Biggest Water Dumbells On The Market
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these for his aqua jogging training. He has them in all sizes but these are his new favorites
customer_reviews.author: Lacremeantik

customer_reviews.title: A nice step up from the standard size
customer_reviews.text: A nice step up from the standard size, have been using 3 to 4 times a week for about 2 months and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JRZ42

customer_reviews.title: Really like these! Lots of water resistance - much better ...
customer_reviews.text: Really like these! Lots of water resistance - much better than those available at the gym pool. Several people have asked me about them, where to get them, etc., particularly guys want to know because they are 'heavy' in the water. Excellent purchase for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Doxie Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I attend water aerobics 3 days a week, and the aquatic center has the yellow (medium) and blue (heavy with two foam rings on each side) dumbbells. It was getting to the point where I really wasn't feeling much resistance with the heavy, so I invested in my own. These definitely give a lot of resistance in the water, and the construction seems very sturdy and doesn't take on water like some of the other dumbbells I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart too easily
customer_reviews.text: Great for use as a flotation device while engaging in core exercises using your bodies weight . Unless you have been using hand weights for awhile , these maybe somewhat heavy to a notice using them in water aerobics. I switch off between these and lighter ones during sessions .
customer_reviews.author: ann kakol

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Durable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I use them in the pool and just received a second set for the lake. My first set has held together well, using every week for past 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Blokland

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Good product but had to use gorilla glue to keep from separating
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Small water dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly what I wanted. Its relative size is smaller than most other small or light dumbbells I have seen. I cannot move as much water as a younger person can. I have used them for several weeks and they are wearing well.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen R.

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Amazon should cease allowing this product to be sold. Within 5 minutes in the water, the endcaps came out and the dumbells came completely apart. Worst Amazon product I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lacovara

customer_reviews.title: Great Part of Nootropic Stack
customer_reviews.text: Uridine and Alpha GPC is a great stack. Just be sure to cycle - 4 days on, 3 days off, 1 each only.
customer_reviews.author: Hobgoblin

customer_reviews.title: Works Well.
customer_reviews.text: This will give you a good upper body workout in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Provides a great workout in the pool. My wife has a lighter pair that just wasn't enough resistance for me (I got bored after 70 or 80 reps). This new set is the largest I could find on line. They provide the resistance I wanted. Surprisingly, it's a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Pretty much as advertised. They work really, really well but a bit sub-par construction for the price. Hope they stand up to the aerobics exercise program I'm on. We'll see! That's the reason I rate them a 4 instead of a 5.
customer_reviews.author: K. KALEB WAYNE WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Omg have used these a few weeks now for my back arms and upper body strength as I am a Hygienist and have back and neck issues ! I absolutely love these in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Burrage

customer_reviews.title: A decent product
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t time I used them the end cap came off of one of the dumbbells...not a hard fix but disappointing....
customer_reviews.author: Randy Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was made better
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I used it the end of it fell off and the weights will not stay on one side. It is now useless to me
customer_reviews.author: Deedee irmen

customer_reviews.title: product as descibed
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I get an awesome workout. Love them well made so far only used twice thus far.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Recommend buying the medium resistance set along with this set ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast and its heavey resistance rating is spot on so be prepared. Recommend buying the medium resistance set along with this set so you can build up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 days
customer_reviews.text: The fourth day I used them the end piece snapped and the weight fell apart. I was disappointed as The description was awesome. Judy Balk
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ann Balk

customer_reviews.title: Love them before they fell apart on day 2
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs and both sets fall apart and I only had them for a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Nemeth

customer_reviews.title: For a little cool exercise...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a pool and you want a fun workout for your arms - try these. Keep your arms underwater so you get full resistance and do very much the same movements as you would in the air. I like these especially to exercise my shoulders - which are always weak and tight.
customer_reviews.author: mary w truland

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: One end came off in the pool and flew up. Will not use it till I glue it down or any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged and would not work with me on getting a partial credit, sending back, poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: defective product
customer_reviews.text: in one barbell, the end stop loosens too easily, regularly, making it unusable. have NOT yet been able to fix.
customer_reviews.author: richard kostelanetz

customer_reviews.title: Inferior glue
customer_reviews.text: Used for less than two months, came apart,have to continually glue them.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn jones

customer_reviews.title: Good work out
customer_reviews.text: Good resistance with these for a challenging work out. One dumbbell has gotten water inside that I haven’t figured how to get out without dismantling the end cap. They dent easily too so over time will look shabby.
customer_reviews.author: Gsmivvelwhip

customer_reviews.title: You better be strong to use these
customer_reviews.text: Great resistance for aquatic aerobics. Keeps these old muscles toned.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest F. Przybyla

customer_reviews.title: ... using my dumbbell since I received them and I love them. They r helping me health
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my dumbbell since I received them and I love them. They r helping me health wise
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn P. Stridiron

customer_reviews.title: Worst quality
customer_reviews.text: In the first 5 minutes the end cap came off and the main shaft was cracked. My husband glued it and the next day the other weights end cap came off. Terrible quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost a year and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Use my heavies almost everyday no less than an hour, faded a little from the pool chlorine, recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cornell H Turner

customer_reviews.title: its the best very good work out
customer_reviews.text: its the best very good work out . They are good quality have a salt water pool and there is no problem with that. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They are harder than my last pair. More of a challenge!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not well constructed
customer_reviews.text: The ends are becoming loose, and the sleeves over the grips are loose. Not very well made, although I'm enjoying use of these in a pool aerobics class (I needed more upper body resistance) I don't think that they will last for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Raymond

customer_reviews.title: End caps don’t stay on.
customer_reviews.text: The end caps keep coming off and I have lost two making them unusable.
customer_reviews.author: sharron thro

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying a lighter pair because i like them so much
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these. I have cheap light weight pair I bought and used for a few days before they trash. I got these last night and used today. I will be buying a lighter pair because i like them so much. i wish i had just bought the set
customer_reviews.author: Michella

customer_reviews.title: Nice resistance, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The resistance of these dumbbells is just what I was looking for to step up my water aerobic workout. Unfortunately, this product is not very durable compared to other brands I have used. Just nesting them together to carry causes permanent indentations in he foam . Rolling around in the back of the car has resulted in many cosmetic nicks in the foam. They still do the job, but after just a couple of months of se are already looking shabby.
customer_reviews.author: SandyS

customer_reviews.title: excellent exercise in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Product worth the cost of the heavier resistance. Use with the medium weights for alternating levels of resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a work-out.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted "heavier" weights for water work-out. These do the trick. Seem well built.
customer_reviews.author: Mimoon

customer_reviews.title: I needed to increase the resistance on my water buoys ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to increase the resistance on my water buoys and after a month of using these, they're still a challenge. Just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte K. Beall

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a week
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the end of one of the dumbbells came off after using it only 4 times. I keep trying to stick it back on but now it just keeps falling off. :(
customer_reviews.author: P.A

customer_reviews.title: Not in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Bought used that were described as in like new condition. One dumbell has large chunks out of it, looks like a dog got ahold of it, definitely not good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! These kick my butt when working out in my hot tub! They are the cadillac of all aqua weights!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for a couple of months now. They hold up well, are sturdy enough to create a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Mesh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing weights!
customer_reviews.text: Love these weights! My workout has increased and muscle mass feels stronger. They are a work out and not easy...but worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: MissEeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I had the smaller set to start with. This one is great but makes you work harder.
customer_reviews.author: dm

customer_reviews.title: Not good value
customer_reviews.text: These weights are badly made. They look nice. But if you use them, they break. They are also impossible to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hugh Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for my water aerobics class, just enough resistance in the water for a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: maureen murphy

customer_reviews.title: They make for a good workout but they fall apart
customer_reviews.text: They make for a good workout but they fall apart. Need to get some pipe glue to glue them together then they might work better.
customer_reviews.author: Girl007

customer_reviews.title: Feel like 20 lbs in water
customer_reviews.text: These are tough for me to use. Feel like 20 lbs in water.
customer_reviews.author: Satviolet

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied, however I am still looking for "super max ...
customer_reviews.text: This is doing what I ordered. Satisfied, however I am still looking for "super max water weights". Can you help?
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Lujan

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to workout.
customer_reviews.text: These spa bells make my water workout so much more challenging. I am glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy q

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: One of the water barbells broke within one week of use and it won’t repair
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Spaziano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are great. A little heaver then what I am use to but they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lady P

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Came apart the first time we used them. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lai-Dee

customer_reviews.title: I love these for the upper body and arm workout
customer_reviews.text: More resistance than the ones I got rid of. I love these for the upper body and arm workout.
customer_reviews.author: C. Savoie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my seventy year old girlfriend, and she LOVES them! Perfect weight and balance, and fit under her arms for support. BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: david m goit

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as sturdy as hoped but very good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these were what I needed- medium fitness level was accurate!
customer_reviews.author: mbrugh

customer_reviews.title: making them useless. Power Systems does not stock replacement ends
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 6 of these for water aerobics class. In less than 6 months of very infrequent use 4 of the end caps came off, making them useless. Power Systems does not stock replacement ends. Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: jimmymac

customer_reviews.title: I like these but find end keeps popping off in pool
customer_reviews.text: I like these but find end keeps popping off in pool. Pain to keep putting back together. Effective though fir arm exercises.
customer_reviews.author: susan katz

customer_reviews.title: however they provide a great workout!
customer_reviews.text: They are a little heavier than I expected, however they provide a great workout!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renette B.

customer_reviews.title: Great size water weight for heavy duty aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing water aerobics for about two years and started with the light resistance dumbbells. After two years of strength exercises, however, I now find that the medium resistance dumbells provide a better workoutfor my biceps. I can't do all my exercises with them since they tend to make me float, so I also work out with a noodle and/or paddles. If you are just beginning, I suggest you start with the light resistance dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Suziesilverado

customer_reviews.title: I love em and can finally get a good workout in ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally someone is making these for men! I love em and can finally get a good workout in the pool...
customer_reviews.author: William Van Vliet

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have to re attach/glue the end piece on one.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Hagemann

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: Well built , durable , expensive , come on , how much do they cost to build ? Driving to a cheaper price cost more in fuel and half a day . You be the judge . Good product . .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kim M. Sallmen

customer_reviews.title: but great to actually gain muscle in a pool
customer_reviews.text: Huge, but great to actually gain muscle in a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Schaefer

product_meta.title: Power Systems Water Dumbbells, Pair
feature_bullets: Soft, durable, non-abrasive closed-cell EVA foam
Cushioned-handle water barbells sold in pairs
Light and portable when out of the water
Perfect for water aerobics, swim exercise, or other aquatic fitness training
3 resistance levels: Light, Medium, Heavy (sold separately)
